Title: 37790 - # Unusual Devices That Can Be Hacked Right Now
Direction: 500 words: Write about 3-6 everyday devices that can be hacked. These could include baby monitors, smart thermostats, or hospital devices. Your audience is internet-savvy tech fans who want to know about the latest awesome geeky gadgets and trends. The target URL goes to a page that explains how credit card companies have established data collection rules to prevent credit card fraud. You can use the link by explaining that the obvious targets for security like credit cards are being protected, so hackers are going after smaller, unprotected devices to get personal information.

Title: 37791 - # Ways Tech Standards Are Changing
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 ways that changes in tech standards are causing changes to the way businesses need to operate.  Include both changes to the law and changes in industry standards that are not government-regulated. The client link is about PCI DSS financial transaction encryption, so mention that as one of the items. Examples include the government requiring encryption of certain data and the new market presence of payment systems like Apple Pay and Google Wallet.

Title: 37792 - # Ways Criminals Get Your Credit Card Data
Direction: 500 words: Explain 3-6 ways that criminals can get ahold of your credit card data. Describe how the data is obtained and offer tips for how to avoid each scenario when possible. Target tech-savvy audiences who are interested in the specifics of credit card data theft. Include the target URL in an explanation of security measures that can help prevent certain types of theft.

Title: 37793 - # Ways To Ensure Secure Business Communications
Direction: 500 words: Discuss 3-6 ways business owners can make sure their business communications are more secure. These tips should be oriented toward cloud computing and new business technologies. Your audience will be mid-sized to large enterprise managers who are concerned about sensitive company data getting into the hands of competitors or the public, but who are not particularly tech-savvy. The target URL has a section that discusses the importance of data encryption when working with HIPAA and HITECH compliance. To include the target url, you can mention that some sensitive information is required by law to be encrypted so that it meets HIPAA requirements.

Title: 37794 - # Awesome Password Managers To Make Your Life More Secure
Direction: 500 words: Discuss 3-6 popular password management applications that will help users ensure that their online accounts are secure. Password management applications are growing in number and popularity. However, many people do not fully understand their benefit. The purpose of the article is to highlight the importance of using these applications to protect against the common cyber-threats. You can mention the client link by talking about the particular importance of maintaining security at work, especially if you work in the healthcare industry. Companies go through great lengths to ensure security. Passwords are an important layer as a first line of defense. They also use encryption when handling sensitive information. The target link also has a section about the importance of data encryption. Your audience will be people who use the internet for everyday things such as online banking and social media, but who are still manually creating passwords for each online account.

Title: 37795 - # Types of Data That Need Secure Storage
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 types of data that are under governmental regulation or otherwise need to be carefully safeguarded by companies that posses them. The target URL on HIPAA compliance is one example of such data, and should be easy to work in. The placement site focuses on mobile devices, so a good lead-in might be to suggest extra caution when moving data of this type through your mobile devices. Other examples would be financial information and the personal data of customers. Your target audience is tech-savvy people that utilize smartphones.

Title: 37796 - # Ways to Make Your Tech Work Better
Direction: 500 Words: List 3-6 ways to improve a company's tech and IT infrastructure. Mention the need to keep up with sensitive data storage requirements so you can link the target article about HIPAA compliance in storage. The target can be corporate, but feel free to include tips useful for a wide range of company sizes and types of business. Other suggestions would include hiring a consultant to test your internet security and bringing in a web design firm to make sure your internet presence is optimal for your market.
